email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for this route. The vessel has a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. The starting freight rate we’re quoting is in the low 50s ($50.50 per ton). Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider something in the high 40s? Also, could you confirm the laycan dates? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your position, but given the current market conditions, the best I can do is $49.75 per ton. As for the laycan, we’re looking at October 20-25 for loading. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $49.75 sounds reasonable. Let’s proceed with that. Can you confirm the demurrage rate? Also, please send over the full vessel details and any additional terms. Thanks, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that $49.75 works for you. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro-rata. I’ll send over the full vessel details and contract terms shortly. The laycan remains October 20-25. Let me know if you need anything else. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good. Let’s finalize the deal. Please send over the contract for review, and we’ll proceed with the necessary approvals. Thanks for your help. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve attached the contract for your review. Let me know if there are any issues. Once signed, we’ll confirm the booking. Looking forward to working with you on this shipment. Best, Sarah.
